author: Special Correspondent
text: Candidates who had appeared for the Diploma in Elementary Education Examination in May 2015 can apply for obtaining copies of their answer sheets and re-totalling of marks till February 20, according to a press release. Candidates can download the applications from the websitewww.tndge.inThey would have to pay prescribed fee at the respective District Institute of Education and Training, the release said. The candidates would have to pay Rs.275 per subject for obtaining copies of their answer sheets and online fee of Rs.50. Those who are applying for re-totalling of marks have to pay Rs.205 per subject.
title: Apply for answer sheets before February 20
